title: Safety Instruction
mustWatch: You must watch the full video to continue.
verifyHint: Scan the PDF QR to verify status.

policy.header: Quality & Food Safety Policy and Commitment
policy.mustRead: You must review the entire document.
policy.ackLabel: I have read and accept the Quality & Food Safety Policy and Commitment.
policy.scrollHint: Scroll to the end of the document to enable acknowledgment.

visita.text: If the evacuation alarm sounds, you should go to...
options: The meeting point
Outside the plant, in a place where there are no risks.
Anywhere in the factory area
Only at points authorized for this purpose

visita.text: What should you do before entering production areas?
options: Wash hands
Turn off mobile phone

visita.text: What should you do with any remaining and/or waste materials that you generate?
options: Deposit them in the corresponding container.
Throw away excess fluids

visita.text: In the event of an ammonia leak, we should:
options: Evacuate the premises.
Remain at the workplace until receiving the evacuation or confinement order through the public address system or through the alarm and evacuation team.
Go directly to the meeting point.

contrata.text: In case the evacuation alarm rings you should go to…
options: The meeting point
The exterior of the factory, in a place where there are no risks

contrata.text: Is hearing protection used inside the centre of Danone?
options: Yes, it is mandatory in the signed areas
No, is not mandatory because the work has a short duration

contrata.text: Jewelry and using make-up in production areas is permitted?
options: No, it's not
Yes, it is

contrata.text: Who must provide you the PPE necessary for your work?
options: My company
DANONE S.A.

contrata.text: Have you received information about risks of your task and in the places where you develop your work?
options: Yes, I have
No, I haven’t

contrata.text: Is the use of tools in a bad condition or without a CE marking permitted?
options: Only with a previous deficiencies evaluation
No, it isn’t in any case.

contrata.text: When you perform a job in an area you should…
options: Keep your work area tidy and clean during the work being carried out.
Leave everything tidy when you finished

contrata.text: When you perform actions such as welding or working with fire or working in confined spaces (for example working inside deposits), working at height, lock out tag out…
options: You must check the equipment is in good condition.
You must request and follow every step included in the work permit.

contrata.text: Is cutting energy supply to lock all energy sources when you perform an intervention in a machine necessary?
options: Yes, it always is necessary
No, it isn’t if I am the only one doing the job

contrata.text: The use of safety harness and helmet with chin protection are obligatory…
options: Always when working at height.
Always when working at a height of more than 2m.

contrata.text: When you perform work with manual ladders in areas where LGVs operate you must…
options: Designate the work area with fences
Designate the work area with cones
It is completely forbidden to perform work at height in these areas
No previous answers are correct
Work or stop between LGVs and their loading or unloading area
Be above or under LGVs forks when they are lifted
Access LGVs area for all unauthorized personnel
All of the above answers are correct
Anywhere in the factory area
Only at points authorized for this purpose

contrata.text: What should you do before accessing to production areas?
options: Wash hands
Turn off mobile phone

contrata.text: Can you leave open doors or windows in production areas?
options: Yes, because that way the area is ventilated
No, because it could allow the access of pests and/or molds.

contrata.text: How should you dress when entering production area?
options: With safety shoes, long trousers without upper pockets and long-sleeved shirt without open collar or buttons
With safety shoes, long trousers without upper pockets, long-sleeved shirt without open collar or buttons, hat that covers all hair, also, if you have beard or mustache cover them.

contrata.text: What should you do with any remaining and/or waste materials that you generate?
options: Deposit them in the corresponding container.
Throw away excess fluids

contrata.text: In the event of an ammonia leak, we should:
options: Evacuate the premises.
Remain at the workplace until receiving the evacuation or confinement order through the public address system or through the alarm and evacuation team.
Go directly to the meeting point.
